menu.privacyNotice: By using this app, you agree to our Privacy Policy

privacyPolicy.owner: Evyatar Hazan operates the Password-Generator mobile application (the 'Application').

dataCollection.details: The Password-Generator app does not collect, store, or share any personal information or data from its users. We do not collect information about user input, generated passwords, or any device-specific information.

accountCreation.details: The Password-Generator app does not require users to create accounts or provide any form of registration.

internetConnection.details: The Password-Generator app does not require an internet connection to function. It works completely offline and does not communicate with external servers or services.

advertising.details: The Password-Generator app may display third-party advertisements. These ads may collect data in accordance with the privacy policies of the advertising providers. However, we do not have access to or control over the data collected by these third-party advertisers.

security.details: We take user privacy and data security seriously. While the Application does not collect user data, we implement security measures to protect against unauthorized access, use, or disclosure of any information not collected.

childrenPrivacy.details: The Password-Generator App is not intended for use by children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under the age of 13. If you are a parent or guardian and believe that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us, and we will delete such information from our records.

changes.details: We may update our privacy policy from time to time. It is recommended that you review this privacy policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on the link below.

contact.details: If you have any questions or concerns about this privacy policy, please contact us at

personalWord.details: Think of a word or phrase that is personal to you, something only you would know. This word will be the foundation of your password and should be kept secret.

platformWord.details: Think of a word related to the platform or service for which you need the password. For example, if you're creating a password for your bank, use a word related to banking. This adds an extra layer of security and makes your password unique to each platform.

secret.details: Do not share the personal word you use with anyone. It is the key to generating your unique passwords.

obvious.details: Choose platform-specific words that are not easily guessable by others.

securityNeeds.description: - Select the Password Option that Fits Your Security Needs:
securityNeeds.details: Depending on the sensitivity of the account, choose the generated password option that best aligns with your security requirements.

Note.details: Your generated passwords are not stored anywhere within Password-Generator. They are generated on-the-fly based on your inputs and are not accessible to anyone, ensuring your security and privacy.

thanks.details: Thank you for choosing Password-Generator! Your online security is our priority. If you have any questions or concerns, feel free to contact our support team.
